junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> I just heard Kent's developer testing presentation
> from Agitar today and he mentioned that JUnit 4.0 can
> actually be checked out of CVS and the biggest change
> is for support for annotations from Java 5.

He also said that he can't commit to a date, but that we should "expect a
release in the near future".

Cheers, Ilja
